name: IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 on a single virtual machine - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys a standalone instance of IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.displayName: IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys a standalone instance of IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1 on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition - one instance, one database

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition V11.1

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for DB2 V11.1 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
3. Recommended Fix Packs for DB2 - http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21321001
4. IBM Knowledge Center for DB2 V11.1 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_11.1.0
5. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
